text: Professor Artur Lopes Artur Oscar Lopes (born 17 October 1950 in the city of Rio de Janeiro) is a Brazilian mathematician working on dynamical systems and ergodic theory.Academia Brasileira de Ciências – Artur Oscar Lopes He is a professor at UFRGS, Porto Alegre.http://mat.ufrgs.br/~alopes/ He earned his Ph.D. from the IMPA in 1977 under the supervision of Jacob Palis. He is a recipient of Brazil's National Order of Scientific Merit in mathematics. Since 2007 he has been a member of the Brazilian Academy of Sciences.
